revision.revremark: This file containts only variables that are common to ALL D&H decoders, in ALL versions, and in ALL firmware versions from fw3.02 and up.
CV50-63 exclude for combo sound decoders
Created from Vars_common.xml, customized for Trix 66840 default values
Spelling change to match new DH def pane for start and brake options.
